home.whats_your_vision_text: Online tool for interior designers, matches the most suitable artwork for their space throug a visual algorithm and personal preferences
home.how_it_works_01: Upload a photo of your room / sketch (optional)
home.how_it_works_02: Use the filters to search for artwork
home.how_it_works_03: Review the pictures on your room’s photo
home.how_it_works_04: Export the file to a document you can share with your clients
home.how_it_works_05: Order the artwork and get the delivery in few days

intro.step1: 1. Upload a picture of your room or choose one from our library
intro.step2: 2. Choose the filter that fits your vision
intro.step3: 3. Select the artwork according to your preferred color
intro.step4: 4. Pick the artwork that you like
intro.step5: 5. See the artwork you chose appear on your project board
intro.step6: 6. Start your designing process with the artwork your choose in visual tool
intro.step7: 7. Enjoy our visualization tool, see the artwork in your space and select the canvas size that you like
intro.step8: 8. Return to the home page, what will save your collection
intro.step9: 9. Continue to purchase and make your design reality
